DIA_VolkerGuard_Young_SQ505_Stop_03_01: I knew someone had been hanging around our place lately...
DIA_VolkerGuard_Young_SQ505_Stop_03_02: Tell me what you're looking for here!
DIA_VolkerGuard_Young_SQ505_Stop_Old_15_: How old are you? Aren't you too young to be a mercenary?
DIA_VolkerGuard_Young_SQ505_Stop_Old_03_: None of your business! I'm just here to deliver the letters. You better tell me what you're doing here!
DIA_VolkerGuard_Young_SQ505_Stop_Gold_15: You must be doing this for the gold, huh?
Here, this should be enough for you to get far away from Archolos and start a new life.
DIA_VolkerGuard_Young_SQ505_Stop_Gold_03: Really? You want to give me all that gold?
DIA_VolkerGuard_Young_SQ505_Stop_TakeIt_: You better take it before I change my mind...
DIA_VolkerGuard_Young_SQ505_Stop_Easy_15: Relax, I don't want to hurt you!
DIA_VolkerGuard_Young_SQ505_Stop_Easy_03: Then you make my job easier!
DIA_VolkerGuard_Young_SQ505_Stop_Mistake: You made a mistake coming here!
DIA_VolkerGuard_Young_SQ505_Stop_Old_Gol: You must be doing this for the gold, huh? (Bribe 2000 GP)
